attributes.additional_details: If people spent just 5pounds to 8pounds more on a single reusable,  refillable vape, there would be less fully functioning,  batteries and plastic in our landfills and on our streets!
attributes.background:
Ban disposable vape.
If more people would spend just 5 to 8 pounds more they could buy a refillable vape and save the planet with less batteries and plastic that fills our street floors and landfills!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628115
